info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 5:30PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Boulder County through 615 PM MDT... At 529 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Longmont, or 24 miles south of Fort Collins, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Longmont. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
